text: Tandubhila gene malangago a Yeshu gubhatandwibhe kwaalugulilanga bhaajiganywa bhabho gwangali nng'iyo kuti bhanapinjikwa kwenda ku Yelushalemu, na kweneko bhapinga potekwa na bhanangulungwa na bhakulungwanji bhaabhishila na bhaajiganya bha Shalia. Kuti, bhapinga bhulagwa na lyubha lya tatu shibhayuywe.
